columns.name: total_deaths
columns.description: Total deaths attributed to COVID-19

columns.name: total_cases
columns.description: Total confirmed cases of COVID-19

columns.name: total_tests
columns.description: Total tests for COVID-19

columns.name: total_tests_per_thousand
columns.description: Total tests for COVID-19 per thousand

columns.name: total_vaccinations
columns.description: Total number of COVID-19 vaccination doses administered

columns.name: total_boosters
columns.description: Total number of COVID-19 vaccination booster doses administered (doses administered beyond the number prescribed by the vaccination protocol

columns.name: total_people_vaccinated
columns.description: Total number of people who received at least one vaccine dose

columns.name: total_people_fully_vaccinated
columns.description: total_people_fully_vaccinated (original name people_fully_vaccinated): Total number of people who received all doses prescribed by the vaccination protocol

columns.name: total_people_vaccinated_per_hundred
columns.description: total_people_vaccinated_per_hundred (original name people_vaccinated_per_hundred): total_people_vaccinated_per_hundred:Total number of people who received all doses prescribed by the vaccination protocol per 100 people in the total population

columns.name: total_cases_per_million
columns.description: Total confirmed cases of COVID-19 per 1,000,000 people

columns.name: total_deaths_per_million
columns.description: Total deaths attributed to COVID-19 per 1,000,000 people

columns.name: total_vaccinations_per_hundred
columns.description: COVID19 vaccine doses administered per 100 people

columns.name: cur_reproduction_rate
columns.description: cur_reproduction_rate (original name reproduction_rate): Real-time estimate of the effective reproduction rate (R) of COVID-19. See https://github.com/crondonm/TrackingR/tree/main/Estimates-Database

columns.name: cur_icu_patients
columns.description: cur_icu_patients (orignal name icu_patients): Number of COVID-19 patients in intensive care units (ICUs) on a given day

columns.name: cur_hosp_patients
columns.description: cur_hosp_patients (original name hosp_patients): Number of COVID-19 patients in hospital on a given day

columns.name: cur_weekly_hosp_admissions
columns.description: cur_weekly_hosp_admissions (original name weekly_hosp_admissions): Number of COVID-19 patients in hospital on a given week

columns.name: cur_idx_positive_rate
columns.description: cur_idx_positive_rate (original name positive_rate): The share of COVID-19 tests that are positive, given as a rolling 7-day average (this is the inverse of tests_per_case)

columns.name: total_gdp_per_capita
columns.description: Gross domestic product at purchasing power parity (constant 2011 international dollars), most recent year available

columns.name: cur_excess_mortality
columns.description: original name excess_mortality. Percentage difference between the reported number of weekly or monthly deaths in 2020â€“2021 and the projected number of deaths for the same period based on previous years

columns.name: cur_excess_mortality_cumulative_per_million
columns.description: cur_excess_mortality_cumulative_per_million:original name excess_mortality_cumulative_per_million.Cumulative difference between the reported number of deaths since 1 January 2020 and the projected number of deaths for the same period based on previous years, per million people.
